website_summaries.verdict: A great starter digital microscope that introduces even young explorers to the wonders of magnifying their everyday surroundings, compatible with both Macs and PCs.
pros: Provides up to 85x magnification on a 27" monitor
Handheld unit is highly portable and simple to use
Great for kids, hobbyists, and those with weaker vision who want to see everyday items close up
cons: items to be magnified need to be close to computer

customer_reviews.title: Trichromes are easily visible with this scope.
customer_reviews.text: This scope should be an industry standard when it comes to checking Trichromes . If you are using a hand held or even a phone scope it's time to retire that and get with the program. This should be a 10 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Careg Morbert

customer_reviews.title: Me vs. technology...
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat little gadget for anything not really serious, like playing with kids, if your hands aren't very steady, unless you can figure out some kind of stand for it. Its rounded design makes that a little difficult. Whenever I needed to focus on something very specific and keep it there, especially something up in the air like plants I was using it on, and look at the pc at the same time, it became pretty rough. And I found that its focus was not all that great. It could have all been just me, but I had a heck of a time using it for anything other than a toy. I will stick to a real one.
customer_reviews.author: V. B. Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother with this if you have Windows 10. ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother with this if you have Windows 10. I installed the software and tried multiple usb ports. I uninstalled and reinstalled the software. I was troubleshooting online for over an hour and the USB is still not recognized. I have USB flash drives and a mouse that never have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the zorb was the difference between early, late, or RIGHT ON THE MONEY buds.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Blue

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool and Perfect in Everyway.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works amazing. Better than the 60-100x hand-held microscope I bought. Should've saved my money and just bought this from the beginning. You can take pictures, time lapse pictures and video with this microscope. You can see everything as clear as day right from your laptop. You do need to take your time and move slowly and adjust your focus very slowly to get a clear shot, but once you do is amazing. Also note and realize that common sense would tell you, you can focus on what's close or what's in the far back of your screen not both. Very cool
customer_reviews.author: Jaw

customer_reviews.title: Quality of magnification and the picture.
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this and am extremely happy with it. Easy to setup just download and install the software. The magnification is amazing and picture quality too I bought this to check the trichomes on my plants and “believe me” I know where I stand and when to harvest. I don’t do well with jewelers loops.
customer_reviews.author: James McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Great little scope.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to examine coins and jewelry. Plugged it into my laptop and it worked EXACTLY as I hoped. Good lens, images are nice and sharp. The only thing that I might suggest is that they also make available some type of stand. My hand isn't steady enough to hold it perfectly still so I made a stand to hold it (kind of like a lab microscope). With this, I can just slide items to be viewed in and out from under the camera. Anyway, this is a very well made item.
customer_reviews.author: John Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Did the trick and enabled me to closely examine my indoor garden for, ehr, let's just say I was able to tell my plants were ready to be harvested after looking at them with this bad boy. Hard to hold it steady, but really easy to work.
customer_reviews.author: S. Scheide

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great device
customer_reviews.text: I found this very easy to set up and use. It worked perfectly right out of the box once I installed the software on my computer. The magnification and resolution are very good in my opinion. I am glad I didn't pay more to get something even better since this does such a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and Useful for Flower!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my tools. This really helps you get up close and personal with flower. If you use the record function, it makes it even easier to get into the flower and really get an idea of where you stand in terms of time to harvest. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great. I was able to put it in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great. I was able to put it in a zip-lock, cut the corner out and take a picture of a dental problem. I then email it to my dentist and he was able to tell me what to do. Same with my primary care. Great tool for the money for splinters and anything else where you can't see. Just hook it up to the computer, put the lens over the area and you can see on your monitor and take a picture.
customer_reviews.author: azsunnin

customer_reviews.title: The top of the egg Rotates to focus and is easily used by younger children
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for grandchildren aged 4 to 8. They ware able to used with minimal guidance. Using a tablet with front and rear cameras took a little longer to figure out. The top of the egg Rotates to focus and is easily used by younger children. I found the 53X is adequate for kids <10 years old. The instruction should have instruction to deal with this setup. Using Win 8.1 simply select the camera App and swipe from the bottom up and and select the correct camera.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schleicher

customer_reviews.title: a little hard to get to focus right but the bang for the buck is amazing. The ability to take pictures and videos is ...
customer_reviews.text: works very well, a little hard to get to focus right but the bang for the buck is amazing. The ability to take pictures and videos is very cool, kids love looking at stuff under it. Word of caution do not look at your pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly useful
customer_reviews.text: Just great for a tone of uses, and no problems with software. It's definitely plug and play, and the images can be saved and shared just like any other image.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Silva

customer_reviews.title: Zorb digital microscope
customer_reviews.text: I chose 4 star's because it was very good at looking at trichromes but, it could be a little better. It does the job well though. The color could be reproduced better on screen. This is important when determining harvest time so the truer the color the better chance of getting the harvest time perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kaptain Kindbud

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it works great if you have a way to hold it still ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it works great if you have a way to hold it still or use on a table otherwise cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: His child

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. But, you need a steady hand. Might be nice to have shake control like a typical point and shoot camera. But I found a simple way to stabilize it. Great picture. And you can further magnify it with your computer.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. D

customer_reviews.title: I wish the picture snap button would be on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish the picture snap button would be on the side or on the software. Your hand is incredibly shaky when going to take photos and having it on top is inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: IATFalcon

customer_reviews.title: kids dig it
customer_reviews.text: Ok, it is gross when they hold it up to their nose, but I should have expected that would happen within the first few minutes of plugging it it. Easy to use for 5 yr. old, engaging enough for, well, adults. Hair, bugs, fabric, etc., etc. -- no end of stuff that will prompt kids and parents to say, "oooh, hey, come look at this! You gotta see this . . ."
customer_reviews.author: W. Overton

customer_reviews.title: A Pain in the Ass to Focus
customer_reviews.text: Focus is cumbersome, poorly engineered. A scroll wheel would have been better that having to rotate the entire top of the unit to focus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've been using jewelers loops, tried portable microscopes, ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using jewelers loupes, tried portable microscopes, but this is the first product that gives me the close-up I need without squinting and allows me to take a picture for future reference. Considering the price of this it's a real bargain for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Oke

customer_reviews.title: He is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband as a gift. He uses it to read the tiny inscription on coins in his collection. He is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen R. Thale

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality, even looking at the dollar bill as ...
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed for what my husband wanted it for. Not great quality, even looking at the dollar bill as they show.
customer_reviews.author: EStinson

customer_reviews.title: Worked with my tablet
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to mention that this woked with my S2 tablet. Google play has Xploview USB app and you need an adapter like Ugreen® Micro USB 2.0 OTG Cable On The Go Adapter Male Micro USB to Female USB for Samusung S6 Edge S4 S3 Android or Windows Smart Phones Tablets . Haven't taken photos or videos yet but camera seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Simple installation, just follow the directions, its running on a Windows XP Home Edition desktop computer. Once installed, very easy to operate, even my 5 year old can use it without any help. Taking pictures is very easy, just one click, as is adjusting the focus, very simple. Only one bad thing I can say; there is only one magnification setting, but for the price you can't really complain.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Public

customer_reviews.title: Awesome microscope!
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome digital microscope! Takes a little learning curve to get to where the images are recorded clear but after learning it's the best microscope I've ever used. I would recommend to others to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Christenson

customer_reviews.title: Having to connect to a laptop is a pain sometimes ...
customer_reviews.text: Having to connect to a laptop is a pain sometimes but it's worth it. Side note, mine didn't automatically download the software so I had to visit the site and search for it to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Colwell

customer_reviews.title: A good buy, and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I think the cost was a little high for the low resolution, but it is one of the easier USB Microsopes to use. It just worked on my Dell Laptop. The built-in webcam Dell software recognized the camera instantly. If the resolution was better I would give it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W McGrew

customer_reviews.title: IF you are expecting it to "just" work forget it!
customer_reviews.text: I guess I will get it running when I have time to sort out all the computer problems that are happening! Otherwise I will try to return it!
customer_reviews.author: DTL

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money and get used for all ...
customer_reviews.text: Neat educational tool! Good value for the money and get used for all kinds of things!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Colson

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: not easy to figure out how to use- not the best quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: best of the microscopes I have used. works great with my Macbook pro
customer_reviews.author: art

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and easy to install. Just one simple executable to download onto your windows-based PC or laptop
customer_reviews.author: Steven C. Exelby

customer_reviews.title: Have a lot of fun with the kid looking inside ears and up noses
customer_reviews.text: This is a blast. Have a lot of fun with the kid looking inside ears and up noses. Always generates giggles and interest. Drivers are stable and Ive even dropped it with no issues. Nice solid item.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!

customer_reviews.text: Excellent seller, Highly recommended. Fast shipping, Great Price, Thanks! AAA+++

customer_reviews.text: A really fun and useful tool. We use it for looking at Stamps to evaluate condition and value.

customer_reviews.title: Tool for collectors who need detail enlargements

I must have been a bit thick headed when I got it because I kept pushing the button to focus instead of turning the top half of the device. Itt is much more attractive and useful if you learn to use it properly. Not sure if I missed something in the instructions or if the literature was lacking.

customer_reviews.title: So fun

customer_reviews.text: I tried for about an hour to get this to work. Called the help number and loaded new drivers. I was unable to capture a still image from the button on top or by using the mouse. I returned the item. I was using a computer with windows XP
customer_reviews.author: turboramjet

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: The microscope part of the device works great, but the picture it takes is horrible. At a resolution of 640 X 480, you get what you see on the screen. As soon as you try to zoom in the picture just turns to fuzz. If you are going to get a USB microscope, spend the money for one that take decent pictures. I do agree that this would be fun for kids to play with, but it really is just a toy.
customer_reviews.author: T Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed with the Carson zOrb
customer_reviews.text: It's super cool super fun easy to use. I love it the pictures are great.

customer_reviews.title: Its just OK. But. not worth the money.

In settings I can see a zoom option, but do not have access to it. WHY? The focus feature as far as I can tell is just there as an annoyance, because it has absolutely no effect on the image on the screen..

customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this product and impressed with the quality for the price. I might deduct 1/2 pt for lack of installation help. But I just went online to find where to download and install. I suggest the driver installation should automatically point the user to this info. I am using this on a Surface Pro with Windows 10.

customer_reviews.text: This is total garbage. The image quality is horrible. It's useless. A magnifying glass gives better results. Why take a photo when you'll never want to look at the photo. The photos the company uses on it's packaging are fake. The real images you'll see are terrible.

customer_reviews.title: It certainly might be fine for some things

The resolution was just too low to make out the details I needed and would just get way to pixelated with any attempt to enlarge. It certainly might be fine for some things, especially for kids and the price is certainly cheap. I would have no problem paying twice the money for twice the resolution. I have much, much better luck taking a photo with my hi res digital camera and macro lens and then zooming in.

I think for a $40 dollar digital microscope it works just fine and for hobby use it is just great. Wish it had come with some software on a CD. Money well spent.

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's not too bad, but at times almost useless unless things are ...

It's an excellent digital microscope for the money!

product_meta.title: Carson zOrb USB Digital Computer Microscope with 65x Effective Magnification (Based on 21 inch Monitor), Surf Blue
product_meta.description: Color:BlueThe zOrb from Carson is a USB Digital Computer Microscope with an integrated camera that displays the magnified image right on your computer screen. Capture true life magnified images with the click of the shutter button. The zOrb connects to your computer through a USB port. A USB 2.0 or 3.0 port is required. You can capture images and even record close focus video! The impressive 65x effective Magnification (on a 21-Inch monitor) allows you to see details of ordinary objects you never knew existed! To determine the approximate magnification power, multiply your computer screen size by 3.17. Example: 54x magnification on a 17-Inch monitor; 65x magnification on a 21-Inch monitor; 73x magnification on a 23-Inch monitor; 85x magnification on a 27-Inch monitor. The built-in internal illuminator ensures a clear and bright image. The zOrb Digital Microscope is currently available in only one color: Surf Blue. Capture an image to keep on your computer using the built-in 2.0 mega pixel digital camera. The zOrb digital microscope boasts an impressive 1600x1200 picture resolution. The zOrb is compatible with Microsoft Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8.0/8.1, Windows 10 and all MAC operating systems. Easy to hook-up and use. Fun for all ages. Please note that the zOrb Digital Microscope is NOT COMPATIBLE with Tablets. At Carson, we strive to make sure our customers are 100% satisfied with the quality of our products. We are so confident in our products that we back them with a One Year Limited Warranty! This Carson product is warranted to be free from defects in material and workmanship for a period of one year from date of purchase. Please contact Carson for additional warranty details. Please note that the effective magnification is a combination of the optical system and a high powered digital zoom.
feature_bullets: The zOrb is a Digital USB Computer Microscope with an Integrated Camera that Displays the Magnified Image right on your Computer Screen | 1600x1200 Pixel Screen Resolution
65x Effective Magnification (Based on a 21 inch Computer Monitor) allows you to see enlarged details of ordinary objects | The zOrb Digital Microscopes are NOT Compatible with Tablets
USB 2.0 or 3.0 Port Required | Compatible with MAC and PC | For latest software drivers, please visit the Carson website.
Backed by Carson's One Year Limited Warranty
Internal LED illumination ensures bright, crisp on-screen image | Capture detailed digital images or record video with the click of the shutter button.
